import os

from PyQt5 import QtCore, QtGui, QtWidgets
import morend3 as proj
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QMessageBox

class Ui_project(object):
    def setupUi(self, project):
        project.setObjectName("project")
        project.resize(340, 295)
        self.centralwidget = QtWidgets.QWidget(project)
        self.centralwidget.setObjectName("centralwidget")
        self.gridLayout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.centralwidget)
        self.gridLayout.setObjectName("gridLayout")
        self.label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.centralwidget)
        self.label.setObjectName("label")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.label, 1, 0, 1, 1)
        self.TextTxt = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.centralwidget)
        self.TextTxt.setObjectName("TextTxt")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.TextTxt, 1, 1, 1, 1)
        self.Keytxt = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.centralwidget)
        self.Keytxt.setObjectName("Keytxt")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.Keytxt, 2, 1, 1, 1)
        self.label_2 = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.centralwidget)
        self.label_2.setObjectName("label_2")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.label_2, 2, 0, 1, 1)
        self.Aboutbtn = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.centralwidget)
        self.Aboutbtn.setObjectName("Aboutbtn")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.Aboutbtn, 7, 2, 1, 1)
        self.EnctyptTxt = QtWidgets.QTextEdit(self.centralwidget)
        self.EnctyptTxt.setObjectName("EnctyptTxt")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.EnctyptTxt, 3, 0, 1, 3)
        self.Encryptbtn = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.centralwidget)
        self.Encryptbtn.setObjectName("Encryptbtn")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.Encryptbtn, 7, 0, 1, 2)
        self.Exportbtn = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.centralwidget)
        self.Exportbtn.setObjectName("Exportbtn")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.Exportbtn, 2, 2, 1, 1)
        self.Importbtn = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.centralwidget)
        self.Importbtn.setObjectName("Importbtn")
        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.Importbtn, 1, 2, 1, 1)
        project.setCentralWidget(self.centralwidget)
        self.menubar = QtWidgets.QMenuBar(project)
        self.menubar.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 340, 21))
        self.menubar.setObjectName("menubar")
        project.setMenuBar(self.menubar)
        self.statusbar = QtWidgets.QStatusBar(project)
        self.statusbar.setObjectName("statusbar")
        project.setStatusBar(self.statusbar)

        self.Encryptbtn.pressed.connect(self.submit)
        self.Aboutbtn.pressed.connect(self.about)
        self.Exportbtn.pressed.connect(self.Export)
        self.Importbtn.pressed.connect(self.Import)

        self.retranslateUi(project)
        QtCore.QMetaObject.connectSlotsByName(project)

    def retranslateUi(self, project):
        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
        project.setWindowTitle(_translate("project", "Project"))
        self.label.setText(_translate("project", "Text:"))
        self.label_2.setText(_translate("project", "Key:"))
        self.Aboutbtn.setText(_translate("project", "About"))
        self.Encryptbtn.setText(_translate("project", "Encrypt"))
        self.Exportbtn.setText(_translate("project", "Export"))
        self.Importbtn.setText(_translate("project", "Import"))
    def submit(self):
        if self.Keytxt != '':
            proj.flag = True
            for i in self.TextTxt.text():
                if proj.alphabet.find(i) == -1:
                    proj.flag = False
            for i in self.Keytxt.text():
                if proj.alphabet.find(i) == -1:
                    proj.flag = False
            if proj.flag:
                self.EnctyptTxt.setText(proj.vigenere(self.TextTxt.text(), self.Keytxt.text()))
            else:
                self.EnctyptTxt.setText("you cant enter a number or an uppercase key")
        else:
            self.EnctyptTxt.setText("You didnt enter a key")
    def Import(self):
        # select file pop up
        File = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(None, 'select directory for your key', r"D:\\", "Text files(*.txt)")
        # file route inside the pc
        readfile = open(File[0])
        # contents of file sent to the textEdit
        self.TextTxt.setText(readfile.read())
    def Export(self):
        self.EnctyptTxt.setText("yes")
        saveFile = open("C:\\encryptedText\\SecretText.txt", "w")
        saveFile.write(self.EnctyptTxt.toPlainText())

    def about(self):
        reply = QMessageBox.question(
            self.centralwidget, "עורך התוכנה",
            "ואדים אגרונוב ת.ז 321075293",
            QMessageBox.Ok,
        )
    def message(self,mess):
        reply = QMessageBox.question(
            self.centralwidget, "Message",
            mess,
            QMessageBox.Ok ,
        )
import sys
if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv)
    ex = Ui_project()
    w = QtWidgets.QMainWindow()
    ex.setupUi(w)
    w.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
